testimonial1.text: Thanks to LaCherada I was able to get the tools I needed for my project without having to buy them.
testimonial1.author: María González

testimonial2.text: An incredible community. I've met many neighbors and we've created a mutual support network.
testimonial2.author: Carlos Rodríguez

testimonial3.text: Perfect for exchanging books and educational materials. My children always have something new to read.
testimonial3.author: Ana Martínez

q1.question: How do I post an item?
q1.answer: Simply register, go to your profile and use the 'Post' button. Add photos, description and type of exchange.

q2.question: Is it safe to use LaCherada?
q2.answer: Yes, we have a user verification system and secure communication within the platform.

q3.question: What types of exchanges can I make?
q3.answer: You can lend, sell, donate or exchange objects and services with other community members.
